name: Emergency Mechanised Response
description:
Basic details: more to follow when less tired.

Controls: Keys or Joypad, you'll have to work out the latter on your own device.

WSAD - Throttle and turning. You can only steer your mech while it's moving. The throttle bar is in bottom right. It also shows the min speed below which your mech will stop automatically.

Q/E - Rotate torso

LMB/Fire1 - Fire Watercannon. Use this to put out fires, but beware, there is only finite water in the tank (top left bar)

RMB/Fire2 - Turn your siren on/off for kicks

ESC: To open quit menu to leave game

OBJECTIVE: Put out all the fires. Didn't get a chance to make a minimap or pointers, so you need to locate them. Look for smoke, or the sound of the inferno.

Flip cars with your watercannon for lolz.

CREDITS: Following assets were used to have a game rather than a mech walking around in an empty room: Ambulance by Mixaill, Police Interceptor by SICS Games, Fukuoka city scenery by ZENRIN, Scifi skin by 3d.rina, Fantasy Skybox by Render Knight, Feel by More Mountains, Inverse Kinematics by Dogzerx, various free sound libraries.
